Articles.Content:
I am having issues placing plug-ins and mods. I have a parts directory, and there is a parts directory in game data-squad directory. I have no plug-ins folder, or plug-in data folder. Where should I create them? I am using the latest full version of KSP.

Edited June 2, 2013 by Jair

Most addons have the folder structure in the zip so just unzipping them to the main directory is usually enough

Otherwise it's a good idea to check the readme or the addon's thread for info on exactly where it should go, most things can go in the KSP_OS\Parts folder, and you can make the KSP_OS\Plugins folder yourself if necessary.

Plugins usually generate the KSP_OS\PluginData folder themselves.
My parts directory is empty, though the parts directory that is in the game data-squad directory has parts in it. Is this my parts folder I should be adding to?
Put the part files into the empty directory.
Thanks! I think I have it going the right way now.
